column2: "Dɛm a
column3: nna ebɛnadze mu na Jewnyi enya no yie ma ɔbor do? Anaaso dɛ ebɛn mfaso na ɔwɔ twatsiatwa ho?"

column2: "Mfaso a ɔwɔ mu dɔɔ so akwan nyina mu. Dza odzi kan nye dɛ Jewfo na wɔdze Nyankopɔn nsɛm hyɛɛ hɔn nsa."
"Na sɛ binom anngye enndzi a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn? Ana hɔn ekyingye bɛma Nyankopɔn no nokwardzi ayɛ kwa?"

column2: "Dabida: na mbom ma Nyankopɔn nyɛ nokwafo
column3: na nyimpa nyina nyɛ atorfo; dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column4: Ama eedzi bem wɔ wo nsɛm mu

column2: "Na sɛ hɛn brakyew yi na oyi Nyankopɔn ne tsenenee kyerɛ a
column3: yɛbɛse dɛn? Dɛ Nyankopɔn nntsen dɛ ɔdze ebufuw ba hɛn do anaa? (Mekasa dɛ nyimpa.)"

column2: "Dabida: sɛ ɔtse dɛm a
column3: nkyɛ Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ dɛn ebu wiadze atsɛn?"

column2: "Na sɛ wɔnam m’ator do ahyɛ Nyankopɔn no nokwar enyimnyam mbordo a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na wɔda ho bu me atsɛn dɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi?"

column2: "Na ebɛnadze ntsi na yɛnnka dɛ
column3: (dɛ mbrɛ binom ka to hɛn do dɛ yɛse dɛ)
column4: Hom mma yɛnyɛ bɔn ama papa aaba? Hɔn dɛm no na wɔfata afɔbu."

column2: "Dɛm a ebɛn asɛm a? Wɔkyɛn hɛn anaa? Dabiarada: osiandɛ yeedzi kan aka afa Jewfo nye Griikfo nyina ho dɛ
column3: hɔn nyina hyɛ bɔn ase;"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column3: Ɔtseneneenyi nnyi hɔ

column2: "Obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔwɔ ntseasee
column3: Obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn ekyir kwan;"

column2: "Hɔn nyina amanaman
column3: hɔn nyina ayɛ dza mfaso nnyi ho; Obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ papa

column2: "Hɔn meneba yɛ nda a oebue; Wɔdze hɔn tɛkyerɛma adaadaa; Nhurutsia bɔr wɔ hɔn anofamfa ase:"
"Hɔn anomu ahyɛ ndom nye wenwen ma;"
"Hɔn anan yɛ har dɛ wɔdze keka bɔgya gu;"
"Ɔsɛɛ nye amandzehu wɔ hɔn akwan do
"Nyankopɔn ho suro biara nnyi hɔn enyiwa do."
"Na yenyim dɛ biribiara a mbra no se no
column3: ɔka kyerɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ mbra no ase
column4: ama wɔaaka ano nyina ato mu
column5: ma wiadze nyina eedzi Nyankopɔn atsɛmbu mu fɔ."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔnam mbra no ndwuma do a worummbu honam biara bem wɔ n’enyim: na mbra no do na wɔnam hu bɔn mbrɛ ɔtse."
"Na afei dze
column3: woekwetsi mbra no eyi Nyankopɔn ne tsenenee bi edzi
column4: no ho dase na mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no dzii:"

column2: "dza ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn tsenenee no a ɔnam Jesus Kraest ho gyedzi do hɛn hɔn a wɔgye dzi nyina mu no
column3: osiandɛ nyiyimu biara nnyi hɔ;"

column2: "na hɔn nyina ayɛ bɔn
column3: na wɔatɔ sin wɔ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam ho;"

column2: "na wɔdze n’adom nam pon a ɔwɔ Jesus Kraest mu no do bu hɔn bem kwa."
"Ɔno na Nyankopɔn dze no sii hɔ dɛ mpatadze a ɔnam gyedzi do wɔ no bɔgyaa mu
column3: dɛ ɔdze bɛkyerɛ ne tsenenee
column4: dɛ bɔn a kan no wɔyɛe no ɔama etwa mu

column2: "Medɛ
column3: ɔdze kyerɛɛ ne tsenenee wɔ ber yi mu
column5: na ɔaayɛ nyia ɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ Jesus Kraest mu bembufo."

column2: "Dɛm a nna ebɛn kwan na nyimpa wɔ dɛ ɔhyehyɛ no ho? Ɔmmba mu koraa. Ɔnam mbra bɛn do? Ndwuma dze no a? Oho
column3: na ɔnam gyedzi mbra bi do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi yebu no dɛ wokwetsi mbra ndwuma no nam gyedzi do bu nyimpa bem."
"Anaa Nyankopɔn yɛ Jewfo nko dze? Ana ɔnnyɛ amanamamfo so dze bi? Nyew
column3: ɔyɛ amanamamfo so Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Sɛ Nyankopɔn kor no ara na ɔnam twatsiatwafo gyedzi do bobu hɔn bem
column3: na ɔnam hɔn a wonntwaa hɔn twatsia so gyedzi do bobu hɔn bem a

column2: "nna yɛnam dɛm gyedzi yi do ma mbra no yɛ gyan anaa? Dabida: mbom yɛma mbra no tsim."
